metadata.name: Arena
metadata.description:
What awaits us in this theater will not be the notions of sense, meaning, value but those, rather, of suspension, risk, bet, checkmate, play, seduction, death. A putting to death of meaning.

Locus Solus is a play by Mem√® Perlini, one of the most representative exponents of Italian avant-garde theater, inspired by Raymond Roussel's surreal 1914 novel.
